Entity.Description: This table stores all the move requests that are created for a node. The move requests may be created from any activity group.
Entity.Name: Move_Request

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_MOVE_REQUEST table.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this move request.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The number of the move request. This field identifies a move request for a node, within the context of a module.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_No

Attribute.Description: The department requesting the move. Valid values are: Replenishment, Outbound Picking, Receipt, Count, Value Added Services, Packing, Outbound Inventory Container Build, Shipping Container Build, and Inspection.
Attribute.Name: From_Activity_Group

Attribute.Description: This code identifies the activity for which the move request is being logged.
Attribute.Name: For_Activity_Code

Attribute.Description: An integer priority. Requests will be processed in the order of this priority.
Attribute.Name: Priority

Attribute.Description: The user who requested the move.
Attribute.Name: Request_User_Id

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the time when the task can start. This is a pass through field which is stamped on each task.
Attribute.Name: Start_No_Earlier_Than

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the time by which the task has to finish. This is a pass through field which is stamped on each task.
Attribute.Name: Finish_No_Later_Than

Attribute.Description: The shipment key that is associated with this move request.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Key

Attribute.Description: The wave key that is associated with this move request.
Attribute.Name: Wave_Key

Attribute.Description: The work order key that is associated with this move request.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: The status of the move request. The system defined Common Code Type is "MOVE_REQUEST_STATUS." Valid values are: Created, Released, Cancellation Requested, Cancellation Failed and Closed.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether there were any exceptions in either creating or executing the tasks for the move request.
Attribute.Name: Has_Exceptions

Attribute.Description: This code identifies the reason why the move request was cancelled. The user defined Common Code Type is "MOVE_REQ_CANCEL_RSN".
Attribute.Name: Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: The description of the reason why the move request was cancelled.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Text

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table contains details of the inventory that needs to be moved against a move request.
Entity.Name: Move_Request_Line

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_MOVE_REQUEST_LINE table.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The move request key that is associated with this move request line.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: The source location from where the inventory is moved.
Attribute.Name: Source_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The destination location to which the inventory is moved.
Attribute.Name: Target_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The receipt header key that is associated with this move request line.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The shipment line against which the move request line was created.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The task type to be used for the task created.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: The type of the License Plate Number. For requests involving a license plate, this field is populated as Case or Pallet.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: A Case Id or Pallet Id.
Attribute.Name: LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The item that is moved.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure of the item that is moved.
Attribute.Name: Unit_Of_Measure

Attribute.Description: The product class of the item that is moved.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: This code identifies the enterprise to which the item that is moved belongs.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The inventory status of the item that is moved.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description: The segment type of the item that is moved. Typical values are: MTO (made to order) and MTC (made to customer).
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: The segment to which the inventory that is moved belongs.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description: The date before which a time-sensitive inventory must be shipped out.
Attribute.Name: Ship_By_Date

Attribute.Description: The tag number of the item, which uniquely identifies a set of inventory tags.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: A serial number for a request involving serialized items.
Attribute.Name: Serial_No

Attribute.Description: The country in which the item that is moved was manufactured.
Attribute.Name: Country_Of_Origin

Attribute.Description: The quantity in the item's unit of measure that needs to be moved.
Attribute.Name: Request_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The quantity in the item's unit of measure for which tasks have been created.
Attribute.Name: Released_Quantity

Attribute.Description: This code indicates whether a line is fully tasked.
Attribute.Name: Released_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether a line is cancelled.
Attribute.Name: Cancelled_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether there were any exceptions in either creating or executing tasks for the move request.
Attribute.Name: Has_Exceptions

Attribute.Description: This code identifies the reason why the move request was cancelled. The user defined Common Code Type is "MOVE_REQ_CANCEL_RSN".
Attribute.Name: Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: The description of the reason why the move request was cancelled.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Text

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the details of the inventory tags, for inventory that needs to be moved against a move request.
Entity.Name: Move_Request_Line_Tag

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_MOVE_REQUEST_LINE_TAG table.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Line_Tag_Key

Attribute.Description: The move request line key that is associated with this move request line tag.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The tag number of the item, which uniquely identifies a set of inventory tags.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: The lot number of the item.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Number

Attribute.Description: The reference information for the lot number.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Key_Reference

Attribute.Description: The batch number of the item.
Attribute.Name: Batch_No

Attribute.Description: The revision number of the item.
Attribute.Name: Revision_No

Attribute.Description: The date of manufacture of the lot to which the item belongs.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Manufacture_Date

Attribute.Description: An attribute of the lot to which the item belongs.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Attribute1

Attribute.Description: An attribute of the lot to which the item belongs.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Attribute2

Attribute.Description: An attribute of the lot to which the item belongs.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Attribute3

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This entity stores audits of all status changes on the move request.
Entity.Name: Move_Request_Status_Audit

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_MOVE_REQ_STATUS_AUDIT table.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Status_Audit_Key

Attribute.Description: The move request key that is associated with this move request status audit.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: The old (previous) status of the move request.
Attribute.Name: Old_Status

Attribute.Description: The new (latest) status of the move request.
Attribute.Name: New_Status

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the date on which the status of this move request was changed to the old (previous) status.
Attribute.Name: Old_Status_Date

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the date on which the status of this move request was changed to the new (latest) status.
Attribute.Name: New_Status_Date

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Stores attributes values based on whose values put away tasks will be executed. Put away Task Type determination algorithm uses the best match algorithm to pick up the strategy that matches the attributes of the stock that needs to be put away.
Entity.Name: Putaway_Strategy

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_PUTAWAY_STRATEGY table.
Attribute.Name: Putaway_Strategy_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_PUTAWAY_STRATEGY table.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The description of the Putaway Strategy.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure of the stock under consideration for put away, or the operation unit of measure for which task creation is attempted.
Attribute.Name: UOM

Attribute.Description: The item's classification or category. The catalog purpose for this item classification would be STORAGE1.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_1

Attribute.Description: The item's classification or category. The catalog purpose for this item classification would be STORAGE2.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_2

Attribute.Description: The item's classification or category. The catalog purpose for this item classification would be STORAGE3.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_3

Attribute.Description: The code of the enterprise for which task creation is attempted.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: For a put away strategy, Put away Task Type determination algorithm uses the best match algorithm to pick up the Task Type based on Source Zone, Source LPNType and Target Zone.
Entity.Name: Putaway_Strategy_Detail

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_PUTAWAY_STRATEGY_DTL table.
Attribute.Name: Putaway_Strategy_Detail_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_PUTAWAY_STRATEGY_DTL table.
Attribute.Name: Putaway_Strategy_Key

Attribute.Description: The source zone where a task originates.
Attribute.Name: Source_Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: The target zone where a task terminates.
Attribute.Name: Target_Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: The type of the License Plate Number from which the task originates. For requests involving a license plate, this field is populated as Case or Pallet.
Attribute.Name: Source_LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: The task type to be used for the task created.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether putaway can be performed on an ad hoc basis.
Attribute.Name: Is_Ad_Hoc_Move

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid
